author: Scott Polacek
title: Michael Jordan 'The Last Dance' Top Moments and Reaction from Premiere Episodes
description: "The best there ever was. The best there ever will be."    Those are the words on the base of the Michael Jordan statue on the inside of the United Center in Chicago...
content:
Martha Irvine/Associated Press
"The best there ever was. The best there ever will be."
Those are the words on the base of the Michael Jordan statue on the inside of the United Center in Chicago. Sports fans starving for content were reminded why that is Sun… [+8363 chars]
